dict.string: FreshWall needs location access to capture GPS coordinates for incident reports. This helps accurately track where graffiti removal work is performed for client documentation.
FreshWall needs location access to capture GPS coordinates for incident reports. This helps accurately track where graffiti removal work is performed for client documentation.
FreshWall saves photos to your Camera Roll for backup and easy access outside the app.
FreshWall accesses your photo library to organize incident photos in a dedicated FreshWall album.
